answers.answer: I drink a can of Pepsi every day for lunch just one though and I asked doctor he said it was fine. I most of the time don't even finish the whole can I have cut back so much though before I was pregnant I would drink like 3 or 4 a Day!
I had a few weeks like this, i drank so much pepsi and i couldnt help it. But eventually i got sick of it from drinking it so much lol
Glad I'm not the only one haha.  Hard to resist cravings but hopefully ill get sick of it too
I crave coke lately too! And I hate it I never drank it pre pregnancy but my cousin recently moved In and drinks it like it's water I just want a sip!!!!
I don't think it's too bad if you are drinking water aswell, my sister in law craved coke and ended up having diabetes during her pregnancy
My entire first pregnancy, I drank soda. This pregnancy, I drank soda. As long as your not overdoing it, I'm sure you're fine.
I hated both pepsi and coke but now I can't get enough of it! It's frustrating lol.
I crave Dr pepper :/ and my taste is so sensitive I can tell if my drink is the tiniest bit flat and won't drink it Lol ...it drives my bf crazy bcuz he can't tell so he think I'm being dramatic!!

question: Ive been drinking coke  everyday for the past few days... is this real bad?  I know we've got cans in the fridge and I can't help but drink them. Ive gone through half a big bottle to myself today. Im 36 weeks 4 days.  Im drinking water everyday too
title: coke cravings
